ip.title: Address of the NGBS iCON controller
ip.description: It's important that this IP address or domain name doesn't change, otherwise the integration will break. Either configure your router to always assign the same IP to this device over DHCP, or configure the controller to use a fixed IP instead of using DHCP.

errors.ENOTFOUND: IP or domain does not exist.
errors.ECONNREFUSED: Connection was refused - maybe not an iCON controller?
